title: Inside Minneapolis, Tom Cruise’s Selfish Movie Career 5.29.20
itunes:title: Inside Minneapolis, Tom Cruise’s Selfish Movie Career 5.29.20
description:
In episode 640, Jack, Miles, and Jamie are joined by super producer (and co-host of Ethnically Ambiguous and Deckheads) Anna Hossnieh to discuss a Republican testing positive for Covid-19 but hiding it from Democrats, White House forgoing their summer economic forecast, Tom Cruise making a movie in space, and more! Plus Stef Alexander AKA rapper P.O.S. joins us to talk about the protests going on in Minneapolis after the murder of George Floyd.

FOOTNOTES:

  1. This Guy Builds Insane Swimming Pool In 60 Days By Hand
  2. WATCH: Build The Most Temple Underground House Bath Pool Underground
  3. The latest on the George Floyd case
  4. MINNESOTA FREEDOM FUND
  5. PA Rep. Andrew Lewis says he has recovered after testing positive for COVID-19
  6. White House to forgo summer economic forecast amid COVID-19, breaking precedent
  7. Tom Cruise Is Making a Movie in Space With SpaceX and NASA
  8. WATCH: Khruangbin - So We Won't Forget (Official Video)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
